SELECT E030.EVENT_USE_ID, -- 비용등록ID E030.EVENT_USER_ID, -- 작성자ID M010.MEMBER_NAME, -- 작성자 PRI.NAME_PATH_PRIORTIY, -- 발의부서 PRI.EVENT_NM, -- 행사명 E030.USE_SUBJECT, -- 비용사용제목 E030.USED_DATE, -- 사용일자 E030.USE_AMOUNT, -- 사용금액 E030.USE_PRO_STATUS, -- 진행상태코드 C010.CD_V_MEANING AS STATUS_NM, -- 진행상태명 (SELECT MEMBER_NAME FROM TB_S020.TB_S020_EVENT020 E020 INNER JOIN TB_S020.TB_S020_MEMBER010 M010 ON E020.EVENT_PAY_USER_ID = M010.MEMBER_ID WHERE E020.EVENT_ID = PRI.ID_PATH_PRIORTIY AND E020.EVENT_PAY_LEVEL = E030.PAY_CURRENT_STEP) AS PAYER_NM -- 결제자명, FROM TB_S020.EVENT_HIERARCHY_VIEW PRI INNER JOIN TB_S020.TB_S020_EVENT030 E030 ON PRI.EVENT_ID = E030.EVENT_ID INNER JOIN TB_S020.TB_S020_MEMBER010 M010 ON E030.EVENT_USER_ID = M010.MEMBER_ID INNER JOIN TB_S020.TB_S020_CODE010 C010 ON E030.USE_PRO_STATUS = C010.CD_V AND C010.CD_TP = 'USE_PRO_STATUS' AND C010.ORG_ID = 0 AND C010.CATEGORY = '000'
WHERE E030.USED_DATE BETWEEN #{fromUsedDate} AND #{toUsedDate} -- 사용일자 FROM / TO AND M010.MEMBER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{memberName}, '%') -- 작성자명 AND PRI.NAME_PATH_PRIORTIY LIKE CONCAT('%',#{namePathPriortiy}, '%') -- 발의부서명 AND E030.USE_PRO_STATUS = IF(#{useProStatus} = "", E030.USE_PRO_STATUS, #{useProStatus}) -- 진행상태코드 AND PRI.ORG_ID = #{orgId}

SELECT E030.EVENT_USE_ID, E030.EVENT_USER_ID, M010.MEMBER_NAME, PRI.NAME_PATH_PRIORTIY, E030.USED_DATE, E030.USE_AMOUNT, E030.USE_PRO_STATUS, C010.CD_V_MEANING AS STATUS_NM, E030.USE_RECEIPT_NAME, E030.USE_RECEIPT_ID, E030.USE_SUBJECT, PRI.EVENT_NM, E030.USE_COMMENT, M010.ACCOUNT_NO, M010.BANK_NM FROM TB_S020.TB_S020_EVENT030 E030 INNER JOIN TB_S020.EVENT_HIERARCHY_VIEW PRI ON PRI.EVENT_ID = E030.EVENT_ID INNER JOIN TB_S020.TB_S020_MEMBER010 M010 ON E030.EVENT_USER_ID = M010.MEMBER_ID AND PRI.ORG_ID = M010.ORG_ID INNER JOIN TB_S020.TB_S020_CODE010 C010 ON E030.USE_PRO_STATUS = C010.CD_V AND C010.CD_TP = 'USE_PRO_STATUS' AND C010.ORG_ID = 0 AND C010.CATEGORY = '000' WHERE E030.EVENT_USE_ID = #{eventUseId} -- 선택한 event_use_id

SELECT E040.EVENT_USE_PAY_ID, E040.PAY_MEMBER_ID, M010_1.MEMBER_NAME AS PAYER_NAME, E040.PAY_RESULT_FLAG, CASE WHEN E040.PAY_RESULT_FLAG = 'Y' THEN '승인' WHEN E040.PAY_RESULT_FLAG = 'N' THEN '반려' END PAY_RESULT_NM, -- 행사 비용 사용 결제결과코드명 E040.PAY_DATE, E040.PAY_COMMENT FROM TB_S020.TB_S020_EVENT030 E030 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_S020.TB_S020_EVENT040 E040 ON E030.EVENT_USE_ID = E040.EVENT_USE_ID INNER JOIN TB_S020.TB_S020_MEMBER010 M010_1 ON E040.PAY_MEMBER_ID = M010_1.MEMBER_ID WHERE E030.EVENT_USE_ID = #{eventUseId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_S020.TB_S020_EVENT040 (EVENT_USE_PAY_ID, CREATE_OBJECT_ID, CREATE_TIMESTAMP, CREATE_PROGRAM_ID, LAST_OBJECT_ID, UPDATE_TIMESTAMP, UPDATE_PROGRAM_ID, EVENT_USE_ID, PAY_STEP, PAY_MEMBER_ID, PAY_RESULT_FLAG, PAY_COMMENT, PAY_DATE ) VALUES ( NEXTVAL(TB_S020.SQ_S020_EVENT040) , #{payMemberId} /* 로그인 MEMBER_ID*/ , SYSDATE() , 'S022300020' , #{payMemberId} /* 로그인 MEMBER_ID*/ , SYSDATE() , 'S022300020' , #{eventUseId} /* 선택된 EVENT_USE_ID*/ , '6' /* 결제단계 */ , #{payMemberId} /* 로그인 MEMBER_ID*/ , 'Y' ,'비용지급' , SYSDATE() );
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_S020.TB_S020_EVENT030 SET LAST_OBJECT_ID = #{memberId} ,UPDATE_TIMESTAMP = SYSDATE() ,UPDATE_PROGRAM_ID = 'S022300020' ,USE_PRO_STATUS ='D' ,PAY_CURRENT_STEP = '6' WHERE EVENT_USE_ID = #{eventUseId}
mapper.select: WITH THIS_MONTH_AMOUNT AS ( SELECT SUM(E030.USE_AMOUNT) AS AMOUNT, E_PATH.ID_PATH_PRIORTIY FROM TB_S020.TB_S020_EVENT030 E030 INNER JOIN TB_S020.EVENT_HIERARCHY_VIEW E_PATH ON E030.EVENT_ID = E_PATH.EVENT_ID WHERE E030.USE_PRO_STATUS IN ('C','D') AND E030.USED_DATE BETWEEN #{fromUsedDate} AND #{toUsedDate} GROUP BY E_PATH.ID_PATH_PRIORTIY ) , BEFORE_MONTH_AMOUNT AS ( SELECT SUM(E030.USE_AMOUNT) AS AMOUNT, E_PATH.ID_PATH_PRIORTIY FROM TB_S020.TB_S020_EVENT030 E030 INNER JOIN TB_S020.EVENT_HIERARCHY_VIEW E_PATH ON E030.EVENT_ID = E_PATH.EVENT_ID WHERE E030.USE_PRO_STATUS IN ('C','D') AND E030.USED_DATE BETWEEN MAKEDATE(DATE_FORMAT(#{fromUsedDate}, '%Y'), 1) /*kjy*/ AND DATE_ADD(#{fromUsedDate}, INTERVAL-1 DAY) GROUP BY E_PATH.ID_PATH_PRIORTIY ) SELECT E_PATH.ID_PATH_PRIORTIY, E_PATH.EVENT_BUDGET_AMOUNT, -- 예산총액 IFNULL(THIS_MONTH.AMOUNT, 0) AS THIS_AMOUNT, -- 당월사용액 IFNULL(BEFORE_MONTH.AMOUNT, 0) AS BEFORE_AMOUNT, -- 전월사용누계 E_PATH.EVENT_BUDGET_AMOUNT - IFNULL(THIS_MONTH.AMOUNT, 0) - IFNULL(BEFORE_MONTH.AMOUNT, 0) AS BALANCE_AMOUNT, -- 잔여예산 E_PATH.EVENT_PATH, -- 발의부서명 M010.MEMBER_NAME -- 발의부서책임자 FROM TB_S020.EVENT_HIERARCHY_VIEW E_PATH LEFT OUTER JOIN THIS_MONTH_AMOUNT THIS_MONTH ON E_PATH.ID_PATH_PRIORTIY = THIS_MONTH.ID_PATH_PRIORTIY LEFT OUTER JOIN BEFORE_MONTH_AMOUNT BEFORE_MONTH ON E_PATH.ID_PATH_PRIORTIY = BEFORE_MONTH.ID_PATH_PRIORTIY INNER JOIN TB_S020.TB_S020_MEMBER010 M010 ON M010.MEMBER_ID = E_PATH.EVENT_HOST_ID WHERE E_PATH.ID_PATH_PRIORTIY = #{idPathPriortiy} AND LEV = 0

WITH EVENT_PATH AS ( SELECT PRI.EVENT_PATH, CASE WHEN CHAR_LENGTH(PRI.EVENT_PATH) - CHAR_LENGTH(REPLACE(PRI.EVENT_PATH, '-', '')) = 0 THEN EVENT_PATH ELSE SUBSTRING_INDEX(PRI.EVENT_PATH, '-', 1) END EVENT_PATH_0, CASE WHEN CHAR_LENGTH(PRI.EVENT_PATH) - CHAR_LENGTH(REPLACE(PRI.EVENT_PATH, '-', '')) >= 1 THEN SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(PRI.EVENT_PATH, '-', 2),'-', -1) ELSE NULL END EVENT_PATH_1, CASE WHEN CHAR_LENGTH(PRI.EVENT_PATH) - CHAR_LENGTH(REPLACE(PRI.EVENT_PATH, '-', '')) >= 2 THEN SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(PRI.EVENT_PATH, '-', 3),'-', -1) ELSE NULL END EVENT_PATH_2, CASE WHEN CHAR_LENGTH(PRI.EVENT_PATH) - CHAR_LENGTH(REPLACE(PRI.EVENT_PATH, '-', '')) >= 3 THEN SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(PRI.EVENT_PATH, '-', 4),'-', -1) ELSE NULL END EVENT_PATH_3, PRI.EVENT_ID, PRI.ID_PATH_PRIORTIY, PRI.EVENT_BUDGET_AMOUNT, PRI.MAIN_EVENT_HOST_ID FROM TB_S020.EVENT_HIERARCHY_VIEW PRI WHERE EVENT_FINAL_FLAG = 'Y' ) SELECT NULL AS PAY_METHOD, /*지급방식*/ M010.MEMBER_NAME, /*수령자, 예금주, 작성자*/ M010.BANK_NM, /*은행*/ M010.ACCOUNT_NO, /*계좌번호*/ E030.USE_AMOUNT, /*금액*/ E030.USE_COMMENT, /*지출내역, 적요*/ C010.CD_V_MEANING, /*상태*/ NULL AS BILL_CD, /*청구서코드*/ '영수증완비' AS TAG, /*분류*/ E_PATH.EVENT_PATH_0, /*발의부서*/ (SELECT MEMBER_NAME FROM TB_S020.TB_S020_MEMBER010 M010 WHERE MEMBER_ID = E_PATH.MAIN_EVENT_HOST_ID AND M010.DATA_END_STATUS IS NULL) MAIN_EVENT_HOST_NAME, E_PATH.EVENT_PATH, /*사용행사*/ E030.USED_DATE, /*작성일*/ E040.PAY_DATE, /*승인일자*/ E030.USE_SUBJECT /*사용제목*/ FROM TB_S020.TB_S020_EVENT030 E030 INNER JOIN EVENT_PATH E_PATH ON E030.EVENT_ID = E_PATH.EVENT_ID INNER JOIN TB_S020.TB_S020_MEMBER010 M010 ON M010.MEMBER_ID = E030.EVENT_USER_ID INNER JOIN TB_S020.TB_S020_EVENT040 E040 ON E030.EVENT_USE_ID = E040.EVENT_USE_ID INNER JOIN TB_S020.TB_S020_CODE010 C010 ON E030.USE_PRO_STATUS = C010.CD_V AND C010.CD_TP = 'USE_PRO_STATUS' AND C010.ORG_ID = 0 AND C010.CATEGORY = '000' WHERE E030.USE_PRO_STATUS IN ('C', 'D') AND E_PATH.ID_PATH_PRIORTIY = #{idPathPriortiy} AND E030.USED_DATE BETWEEN #{fromUsedDate} AND #{toUsedDate}
